thread.title: Police: Homeless man brings skull to parking lot
thread.title_full: Police: Homeless man brings skull to parking lot

author: democratandchronicle.com
title: Police: Homeless man brings skull to parking lot
text:
Florida police are investigating the identity of human remains after a homeless man carried a skull into a grocery store parking lot earlier this week. The man stumbled upon the remains Tuesday morning in the woods and brought the skull to the grocery store to ask someone to call the police, the Indian River County Sheriff's Office said in a statement.
Deputies located the remains 200 feet off of the road. The bones were "slightly scattered, in a manner consistent with animal disruption."
According to police, the bones were found in an area that is often frequented by a small group of homeless people. Authorities came across several homeless people while investigating the scene.
"Those located in the woods were cooperative with investigators and provided information on the possible identity of the deceased subject although detectives have not been able to confirm the name," the statement said.
The remains were taken to the medical examiner's office to determine the cause of death.
Police are asking anyone with information to come forward.
Follow @MaryBowerman on Twitter.
